message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"to do or to work","sentence":"他们在干。","image_prompt":"A group of three people working together, each doing different simple tasks, in a soft apocalypse animation style. The scene is set among ruins and overgrown plants, but the figures look focused and collaborative. The colors are muted with pastel highlights, emphasizing hopeful human activity amidst decay.","sentence_translation":"They are working."}
